item.title: Emoji Domains?
item.dc:creator: Nathan Ziarek
item.content:encoded:
I love Panic—they seem like a great group, dedicated to high-quality software—but can you imagine the usability issues of an emoji domain?

http://www.panic.com/blog/2011/07/the-worlds-first-emoji-domain/
